DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the cost(effectiveness) of three existing antibiotic strategies for patients with community-acquired pneumonia admitted to the hospital, but not the ICU.
DOC.brief_title: Community-Acquired Pneumonia - Study on the Initial Treatment With Antibiotics of Lower Respiratory Tract Infections
DOC.criteria: All patients admitted to one of the participating hospitals needing treatment for CAP, not being admitted to the ICU are eligible for study inclusion. Admission is defined as hospital stay for more than 24 hours. Patients who are readmitted with CAP within 2 weeks after a previous episode are not eligible. Patients with cystic fibrosis are not eligible.
